      • checkHealthInsurancePlan

        public java.lang.String checkHealthInsurancePlan()
                                          throws InvalidInsuranceIDException
        Checks the insurance plan based on the range of the insurance ID. If the insurance id is greater than 0 and and less than 10000 then insurance plan is "Health maintenance organizations (HMOs) plan". Else if the insurance id is greater than or equal to 10000 and less than 20000 then the insurance plan is "Preferred provider organizations (PPOs) plan". Else if the insurance id is greater than or equal to 20000 and less than 30000 then the insurance plan is "Point-of-service (POS) plan". Else if the insurance id is greater than or equal to 30000 and less than 40000 then the insurance plan is "High-deductible health plans (HDHPs)"
        Specified by:
        checkHealthInsurancePlan in interface Insurance
        Returns:
        Insurance Plan
        Throws:
        InvalidInsuranceIDException - - Throws if the invalid insurance id is passed
